Package io.github.ai4ci.config.execution

Interface DemographicAdjustment

public interface DemographicAdjustment
Age-based adjustment values used to modify baseline model parameters.

Main purpose: provide a small set of interfaces that describe how various model parameters may be adjusted by demographic strata (for example age). Implementations supply distribution-like or numeric transforms that are consulted by initialisers and model code to produce age-dependent values.

Downstream uses: referenced by ExecutionConfiguration, in-host configuration types such as PhenomenologicalModel and MarkovStateModel, and by initialisers in DefaultPersonInitialiser.

Author:
Rob Challen

  • Field Details

    • EMPTY

      static final io.github.ai4ci.config.execution.PartialDemographicAdjustment EMPTY
      An empty partial adjustment that applies no demographic modification.

      Used as a default when no age-dependent adjustments are required.

    • AGE_DEFAULT

      static final io.github.ai4ci.config.execution.PartialDemographicAdjustment AGE_DEFAULT
      A sensible default set of age-dependent adjustments used in examples and tests.

      This partial provides example functions for contact probability, clinical severity and immune waning that are suitable for demonstrations and unit tests.
